title: The Sky is blue
creator_credit: Richard Raxlen, Robert Verrall and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: A fanciful story, done in paper cut-outs, of a boy’s journey through the skies on the tail of a kite. He soars high above the earth, encountering birds, aeroplanes, the stars, a spaceship and other heavenly bodies before floating back to his starting point. An animated film for children. Film without words.
